summary: An ordinance relating to and creating an indebtedness in the sum of Eighty-five Thousand Dollars ($85,000.00); providing for a loan and authorizing the issuance and sale of general negotiable interest-bearing serial coupon bonds therefor in said sum, for the purpose of paying the cost and expense of a certain general municipal public improvement; providing for the levy and collection of taxes for the payment of the principal and interest of said bonds; and creating and establishing a construction fund and a bond interest and redemption fund.
